org.mpxj

Interface HasCharset

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MSPDIReader, PrimaveraXERFileReader, SDEFReader

    public interface HasCharset
    This interface is implemented by reader classes which allow a Charset to be specified before reading.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Charset getCharset()
      Retrieve the Charset tp be used when reading.
      void setCharset(Charset charset)
      Set the Charset to use when reading.

    • Method Detail

      • setCharset

        void setCharset(Charset charset)
        Set the Charset to use when reading.
        Parameters:
        charset - Charset instance

      • getCharset

        Charset getCharset()
        Retrieve the Charset tp be used when reading.
        Returns:
        Charset instance
